name: valeria-rss-reader
description: RSS reader with Claude Code notifications - read while Claude thinks

scripts.build: esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/cli.js --format=esm && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/cli.js > dist/cli.tmp && mv dist/cli.tmp dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js && cp -r public dist/

author: laniehei
